channel.title: NextCloud on Sanae's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in NextCloud on Sanae's Blog

item.title: Docker 搭建 NextCloud
item.description: 前言 Nextcloud is functionally similar to Dropbox, Office 365 or Google Drive. It can be hosted in the cloud or on-premises. It is scalable from home office solutions based on the low cost Raspberry Pi all the way through to full sized data centre solutions that support millions of users. —–PrivacyTools 官方 Demo 优势： 100% 开源 全平台客户端支持 高
